title: Alpha Client..?
body:
Still waiting to see if I've been accepted or not...It's been a couple of months. I was talking to a Rioter on another thread and they said it'd take about 3 weeks?

Have I been denied? :3

Cheers

P.S. Sorry if it's in the wrong board, I don't know where else to put it.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I believe the first wave of testers for the alpha client were already accepted a while back (myself included), just keep waiting it out til they bring in another wave of players.
